lead_paragraph: China will raise its defense budget by about 7 percent this year, a government spokeswoman said Saturday, continuing a trend of lowered growth amid a slowing economy despite regional tensions over the South China Sea and other issues.

headline.main: Jordan Hangs 10 for Attacks Linked to Islamic Extremism
